name: Alabaster Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

rulings.text: This will always be shuffled into its owner’s library.

name: Alluring Scent
oracle_text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor_text: Doom rarely smells this sweet.

name: Anaconda
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

name: Anaconda
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

name: Ancestral Memories
oracle_text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

rulings.text: If there are less than 7 cards in the library, look at all of them. Put two into your hand, and the rest in the graveyard.
This is not considered a draw or a discard.

name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: A peasant can do more by faith than a king by proclamation.

name: Archangel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance

name: Ardent Militia
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fights for hearth and home.

name: Armageddon
oracle_text: Destroy all lands.
flavor_text:
"‘O miserable of happy! Is this the end
Of this new glorious world . . . ?'"
—John Milton, Paradise Lost

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

name: Arrogant Vampire
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

name: Assassin's Blade
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

name: Balance of Power
oracle_text: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

rulings.text: The number of cards is counted during resolution.

name: Baleful Stare
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

name: Bee Sting
oracle_text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Blessed Reversal
oracle_text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

rulings.text: The creatures are counted on resolution.

name: Blinding Light
oracle_text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
flavor_text: Let the unjust avert their faces and contemplate their peril.

rulings.text: Will not tap a creature that is both white and another color.

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

name: Bog Wraith
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

name: Boiling Seas
oracle_text: Destroy all Islands.
flavor_text: What burns the land, boils the seas.

name: Border Guard
flavor_text: "Join the army, see foreign countries!" they'd said.

name: Breath of Life
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Bull Hippo
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

name: Burning Cloak
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

name: Capricious Sorcerer
oracle_text: {T}: Capricious Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Charging Bandits
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The fear in their victims' eyes is their most cherished reward.

name: Charging Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

name: Charging Rhino
oracle_text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

name: Cloak of Feathers
oracle_text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: A thousand feathers from a thousand birds, sewn with magic and song.

name: Cloud Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

name: Cloud Pirates
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Pirates can block only creatures with flying.

name: Cloud Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

rulings.text: If it loses Flying, it will be unable to block any creatures.

name: Command of Unsummoning
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Return one or two target attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

name: Coral Eel
flavor_text: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

name: Craven Giant
oracle_text: Craven Giant can't block.
flavor_text:
"The best armor is to keep out of range."
—Italian proverb

name: Craven Knight
oracle_text: Craven Knight can't block.
flavor_text: "I say victory is better than honor."

name: Cruel Bargain
oracle_text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Cruel Fate
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of their library in any order.

name: Cruel Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

name: Deep Wood
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

name: Deep-Sea Serpent
oracle_text: Deep-Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Sailors fear the deep-sea serpent; others thank the gods it has no legs.

name: Defiant Stand
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

name: Déjà Vu
oracle_text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The past is a mirror of the future.

name: Desert Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Never doubt a dragon just because of its size.

name: Devastation
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
flavor_text: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

name: Devoted Hero
flavor_text: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

name: Djinn of the Lamp
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Once they learn the trick of carrying their own lamps, they never touch the ground again.

name: Dread Charge
oracle_text: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.
flavor_text: "As equal were their souls, so equal was their fate." —John Dryden, "Ode to Mrs. Anne Killigrew"

name: Dread Reaper
oracle_text: Flying
When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

name: Earthquake
oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

name: Ebon Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

name: Elite Cat Warrior
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

name: Elite Cat Warrior
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Elven Cache
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor_text: It's up to you if you enter their woods—and up to them if you leave.

name: Endless Cockroaches
oracle_text: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Exhaustion
oracle_text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.

rulings.text: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player’s next untap step. They can still can untap during other player’s untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during their next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

name: False Peace
oracle_text: Target player skips all combat phases of their next turn.
flavor_text: Mutual consent is not required for war.

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

name: Final Strike
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Final Strike deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

name: Fire Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

rulings.text: If there are no other creatures on the battlefield, Fire Dragon will have to target itself. The ability is mandatory.

name: Fire Imp
oracle_text: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

name: Fire Snake
oracle_text: When Fire Snake dies, destroy target land.
flavor_text: The snake's final thrashings only spread the fire within it.

name: Fire Tempest
oracle_text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Flashfires
oracle_text: Destroy all Plains.
flavor_text: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

name: Fleet-Footed Monk
oracle_text: Fleet-Footed Monk can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: "Hesitation is for the faithless. My belief lends me speed."

name: Flux
oracle_text: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: The discard is forced even though you choose how many to discard.
Each player chooses how many cards they would like to discard. That number may be 0.

name: Foot Soldiers
flavor_text: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

name: Forked Lightning
oracle_text: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Forked Lightning, not as it resolves. Each target you choose must be assigned at least 1 damage.

name: Fruition
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

name: Giant Octopus
flavor_text: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

rulings.text: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

name: Gift of Estates
oracle_text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Gift of Estates does nothing if each of your opponents has the same number of lands or fewer as you.
You can find nonbasic lands if they have the Plains land type, such as dual lands (Tundra, et al).

name: Goblin Bully
flavor_text: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor_text: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: A “creature card” is any card with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact, enchantment, or land. Older cards of type summon are also creature cards.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

name: Hand of Death
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

name: Hand of Death
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

name: Harsh Justice
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

name: Highland Giant
flavor_text: Though slow-witted and slow-moving, they are quick to anger.

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot!

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text: Its spear has no shaft, its shield no handle.

name: Howling Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

name: Hulking Cyclops
oracle_text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
flavor_text: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

name: Hulking Goblin
oracle_text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
flavor_text: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

name: Hurricane
oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

name: Ingenious Thief
oracle_text: Flying
When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

name: Jungle Lion
oracle_text: Jungle Lion can't block.
flavor_text: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

name: Keen-Eyed Archers
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: "If it has wings, shoot it. If it doesn't, shoot it anyway."

name: King's Assassin
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor_text: Fear is as effective a weapon as the blade.

name: Knight Errant
flavor_text:
". . . Before honor is humility."
—The Bible, Proverbs 15:33

name: Last Chance
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

name: Lava Flow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land.
flavor_text: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

name: Lizard Warrior
flavor_text: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

name: Man-o'-War
oracle_text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: If there are no other creatures on the battlefield when Man-o’-War enters the battlefield, its ability must target itself.

name: Mercenary Knight
oracle_text: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
flavor_text: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

name: Mind Knives
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card at random.
flavor_text: To dodge the unerring knife, one must be free of thought.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.

name: Minotaur Warrior
flavor_text: The herd's patience, the stampede's fury.

name: Mobilize
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: A rested mind is the sharpest weapon.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

name: Moon Sprite
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I am that merry wanderer of the night."
—William Shakespeare,
A Midsummer Night's Dream

name: Mountain Goat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

name: Muck Rats
flavor_text: The difference between a nuisance and a threat is often merely a matter of numbers.

name: Mystic Denial
oracle_text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

name: Natural Order
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Sacrificing a green creature is part of Natural Order’s cost. You can’t sacrifice more creatures to search for more creature cards, and you can’t cast Natural Order at all if you control no green creatures.

Players can respond to this spell only after it’s been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to stop you from casting this spell or to make you sacrifice a different one.

name: Natural Spring
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor_text: Though many have come to this place to wash their wounds, the water has never turned red.

name: Nature's Cloak
oracle_text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

You can find any card with the land type Forest, including Snow-covered Forest or non-Basic lands like Tropical Island, Murmuring Bosk, or Stomping Ground. You can even find a card that is a land in addition to other types, such as Dryad Arbor.

name: Nature's Ruin
oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures.
flavor_text: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

name: Needle Storm
oracle_text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Noxious Toad
oracle_text: When Noxious Toad dies, each opponent discards a card.

name: Omen
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.

name: Owl Familiar
oracle_text: Flying
When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Panther Warriors
flavor_text: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text: The soldier reaped the profits of peace.

rulings.text: You are a creature’s owner if the card representing it began the game in your deck, or if it’s a token that entered the battlefield under your control. If Path of Peace targets a creature that you own but an opponent controls, you’ll gain 4 life.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Path of Peace tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. No player gains life.

name: Personal Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

name: Phantom Warrior
oracle_text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor_text: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

name: Pillaging Horde
oracle_text: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Plant Elemental
oracle_text: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

name: Primeval Force
oracle_text: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

name: Prosperity
oracle_text: Each player draws X cards.
flavor_text: "Life can never be too good."

rulings.text: If both players run out of cards during this effect, the game is a draw.

name: Pyroclasm
oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

name: Python
flavor_text: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

name: Raging Cougar
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: Mountaineers quickly learn to travel with their spears always pointed up.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

name: Raging Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

name: Rain of Salt
oracle_text: Destroy two target lands.
flavor_text:
It pelts the land with its fury,
spoiling what was once sweet.

rulings.text: You must target two different lands. You can’t choose to target just one.

name: Rain of Tears
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

rulings.text: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.

name: Redwood Treefolk
flavor_text: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

name: Regal Unicorn
flavor_text: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

name: Renewing Dawn
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each Mountain target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Dawn brings a new day, and a new day brings hope.

name: Rowan Treefolk
flavor_text: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

name: Sacred Knight
oracle_text: Sacred Knight can't be blocked by black and/or red creatures.
flavor_text: "No flame, no horror can sway me from my cause."

name: Sacred Nectar
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

name: Scorching Spear
oracle_text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

name: Scorching Winds
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Scorching Winds deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

name: Seasoned Marshal
oracle_text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

rulings.text: Can target an already tapped creature if you want.

name: Serpent Assassin
oracle_text: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

rulings.text: You can cast this if you have less than 3 life, since the life is lost as an effect and not a payment.

name: Skeletal Crocodile
flavor_text: The less flesh there is, the more teeth there seem to be.

name: Skeletal Snake
flavor_text: They watched as the snake shed layer after layer until only cold bone remained.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

name: Sorcerous Sight
oracle_text: Look at target opponent's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Do not react; anticipate.

name: Soul Shred
oracle_text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text: It has more teeth than fit in its mouth.

name: Spiritual Guardian
oracle_text: When Spiritual Guardian enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: Hope is born within.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Spotted Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

name: Stalking Tiger
oracle_text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: No one is happy when they notice a tiger.

name: Starlight
oracle_text: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Stars are like coins dropped into the night: their light buys safe passage.

name: Starlit Angel
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: To soar as high as hope, to dive as swift as justice.

name: Steadfastness
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

name: Stern Marshal
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
I cast a thousand tiny suns—
Beware my many dawns.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Summer Bloom
oracle_text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
flavor_text: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

rulings.text: This spell increases the number of lands you can play in a turn. The land cards are played as you would normally play lands.

name: Sylvan Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

name: Symbol of Unsummoning
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ."
—Kate Chopin, The Awakening

name: Taunt
oracle_text: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

name: Temporary Truce
oracle_text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

name: Thing from the Deep
oracle_text: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.
flavor_text: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

name: Thundering Wurm
oracle_text: When Thundering Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

name: Thundermare
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

name: Tidal Surge
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor_text:
"'Twas  when the seas were roaring
With hollow blasts of wind . . . ."
—John Gay, "The What D'Ye Call It"

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

name: Touch of Brilliance
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Acting on one good idea is better than hoarding all the world's knowledge.

name: Treetop Defense
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)

name: Undying Beast
oracle_text: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

name: Untamed Wilds
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.
Can fetch a snow land.

name: Valorous Charge
oracle_text: White creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Stand in the way of truth at your peril.

name: Vampiric Feast
oracle_text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: It's not always gold the thief is after.

name: Vampiric Touch
oracle_text: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: A touch, not comforting, but of death.

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

name: Vengeance
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

name: Virtue's Ruin
oracle_text: Destroy all white creatures.
flavor_text: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

name: Wall of Granite
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The wisest man builds his house behind the rock.

name: Wall of Swords
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

name: Warrior's Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Warrior's Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is not the absence of fear that makes a warrior, but its domination.

name: Whiptail Wurm
flavor_text: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

name: Wicked Pact
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

name: Willow Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."—William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

name: Winds of Change
oracle_text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

rulings.text: Each player draws a number of cards equal to the number of cards they shuffled into their own library.

name: Winter's Grasp
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: Winter settles on the land, and the land prays it will wake.

name: Withering Gaze
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

name: Wrath of God
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods. They kill us for their sport."
—William Shakespeare, King Lear
